data.title: How Jaya Bachchan refused to leave Amitabh Bachchan when he was allegedly involved with Rekha
data.meta_description: Bachchan and Rekha were rumoured to be in a relationship after starring in a string of films together
data.text:
Amitabh Bachchan and Rekha were seen together in films like Do Anjaane, Imaan Dharam, Muqaddar Ka Sikandar, Mr. Natwarlal, and Silsila. The actress even dubbed for two leading ladies of Bachchan’s 1999 film Sooryavansham. Bachchan and Rekha were rumoured to be in a relationship after starring in a string of films together. It’s rumoured Jaya Bachchan once called the diva home and refused to leave her husband at any cost.
